title: List of municipalities in New Brunswick
summary: New Brunswick is the eighth-most populous province in Canada with 747,101 residents as of the 2016 Census, and the third-smallest province in land area at 71,389 km2 (27,563 sq mi).[1] New Brunswick's 104 municipalities[2] cover only 9.8% of the province's land mass but are home to 68.9% of its population.
